exits.description: the watering hole lies to the north
the rocky terrain levels out and gives way to forest to the west

description: the foothills that border the forests are treacherous. animals roam here from the watering hole to the north, but their legs are better suited for it than yours.
investigationDescription: the mountains rise to the east, impassable. memories of a time long ago, of a place much like this one surface in your mind. another member of your group lost to brutal death.

exits.description: the watering hole lies to the north
the rocky terrain levels out and gives way to forest to the west

description: the rocky footing is especially treacherous in the dark. a broken leg would mean slow death. you've seen it before.
investigationDescription: you cannot see well enough to navigate the terrain.
